children.docstring: - Fixed summary report so files without errors but with warnings are not shown when warnings are hidden
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Reorganised package contents to conform to PEAR standards - Changed version numbering to conform to PEAR standards - Removed duplicate `require_once
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed `.bat` file for situation where `php.ini` cannot be found so `include_path` is not set
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Added .bat file for easier running of PHP_CodeSniffer on Windows - Sniff that checks method names now works for PHP4 style code where there is no sc
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Added sniff to check for invalid class and interface names - Added sniff to check for invalid function and method names - Added sniff to warn if lin
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed error where comments were not allowed on the same line as a control structure declaration
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Removed the including of checked files to stop errors caused by parsing them - Removed the use of reflection so checked files do not have to be incl
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Initial preview release
children.name: Added

symbols.name: Getting Started
